title: The Hordern mystery
brief_description: A crime drama, based on the novel of same title by Edmund Finn, in which a transfer of identity becomes a fraudulent way of gaining a millionaire’s money by bigamously marrying his daughter. Cast includes Godfrey Cass, Thomas Sinclair, Beatrice Hamilton, Claude Turton, Floris StGeorge, Flo Little. Silent film with intertitles.
